physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Far Rt. Nate Mendel, #437.'' Paper taped to back of photograph: ''National Jewish Welfare Board Award, far right, Nate Mechel, far right sitting - Sam Frazin.''

mods.abstract: U.S.O. - Jewish Welfare Board Rocky Mountain Area conference award ceremony. Rabbi C. E. Kauvar stands at left beside an unidentified man who is handing a Distinguished Service Award to an unidentified woman. Other unidentified award recipients stand behind including Nate Mendel at far right. An unidentified man wearing a United States Army uniform sit in front of them at a head table with Sam Frazin.

name.namePart: Kauvar, C. E. Hillel--(Charles Eliezer Hillel),--1879-1971
